BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY IN PROGRESS UNTIL 110159Z JAN BY
   M/V NPS SANCO SWIFT TOWING 12
   FIVE MILE LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   22-12.27S 039-36.52W, 22-51.08S 038-38.93W,
   23-04.25S 038-49.37W, 22-26.13S 039-46.78W.
   SEVEN MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 110259Z JAN 14.
